name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy GitHub PR link with title

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the URL of GitHub pull requests along with the title, making it easy for recipients to quickly understand the context

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Problem❗:
• Do you often struggle to share GitHub pull request links without providing context? 🙄
• Copying just the URL can leave recipients confused about the content and purpose of the PR.

Solution ✅:
• This extension allows you to copy the GitHub pull request URL along with its title in one click, giving recipients a clear understanding of the context. 🔗
• If pasted in a plain text editor, it will paste just the URL; if pasted in a rich text editor, it will include both the link and the title. ✂️
• Simplify your communication and enhance collaboration with easily sharable links! 🙌


Feel free to share your thoughts and rate the extension if you found it helpful! 💌
